<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H5463|סְגַר]]</big>**</small>
<small>Also see: **<big>[[H4042|מָגַן]]</big>**</small>

 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָגַר‎</span> **verb** ==shut, close== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְגַר‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; Zinjirli <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מסגרת‎</span> ***prison*** [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>328</sup>; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סגר‎</span> Pi\`el or Hiph\`il ***deliver over***; possibly Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (prison) ***guard*** [[BDB#Prä|Prä]]<sup>BAS i. 371</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Gen.19.6|Gen 19:6]] +, 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָֽגְרוּ‎</span> [[2Chr.29.7|2Chr 29:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָֽגְר֑וּ‎</span> [[Ps.17.10|Ps 17:10]] (compare [[BDB#Baer|Baer's]] n., [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:29o»§ 29o</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii, 1, 535 Anm</sup>.), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָגָר֑וּ‎</span> [[Gen.19.10|Gen 19:10]]; [[Josh.2.7|Josh 2:7]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסְגֹּר‎</span> [[Job.12.14|Job 12:14]]; [[Mal.1.10|Mal 1:10]], 1 plural cohortative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְגְּרָה‎</span> [[Neh.6.10|Neh 6:10]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְגֹר‎</span> [[Ps.35.3|Ps 35:3]]; [[Isa.26.20|Isa 26:20]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּסֲגֹר‎</span> [[BDB#Baer|Baer]] [[BDB#Gi|Ginsb]]), masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִגְרוּ‎</span> [[2Kgs.6.32|2Kgs 6:32]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִסְגּוֺר‎</span> [[Josh.2.5|Josh 2:5]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֹגֵר‎</span> [[Isa.22.22|Isa 22:22]] feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֹגֶּרֶת‎</span> [[Josh.6.1|Josh 6:1]] (but see below); ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָגוּר‎</span> [[1Kgs.6.20|1Kgs 6:20]] + 12 t.; — 

**1.** ***shut*** door (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּלֶת‎</span>) [[Gen.19.10|Gen 19:10]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[2Kgs.6.32|2Kgs 6:32]]; [[Mal.1.10|Mal 1:10]]; [[Neh.6.10|Neh 6:10]]; [[2Chr.28.24|2Chr 28:24]]; [[2Chr.29.7|2Chr 29:7]] gate (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁעַר‎</span>) [[Josh.2.7|Josh 2:7]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]) [[Ezek.46.12|Ezek 46:12]], compare [[Ezek.44.1|Ezek 44:1]]; [[Ezek.44.2|Ezek 44:2]] (twice in verse); [[Ezek.46.1|Ezek 46:1]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִסְגֹּר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְהִי הַשּׁ‎</span> [[Josh.2.5|Josh 2:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), also (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁעַר‎</span> omitted) [[Josh.6.1|Josh 6:1]] (si vera 1.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֹגֶרֶת‎</span> dittograph according to [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex 13</sup>); door after one (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַחֲרֵי‎</span>), on leaving room [[Gen.19.6|Gen 19:6]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); upon, behind, oneself, from within (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעַד‎</span> q. v.) [[2Kgs.4.4|2Kgs 4:4]]; [[2Kgs.4.5|2Kgs 4:5]]; [[2Kgs.4.33|2Kgs 4:33]]; [[Isa.26.20|Isa 26:20]] (figurative), also (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּלֶת‎</span> omitted) [[Judg.9.51|Judg 9:51]]; [[2Kgs.4.21|2Kgs 4:21]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּלֶת‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעַד‎</span> upon one left inside [[Judg.3.23|Judg 3:23]], and (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּלֶת‎</span> omitted) [[Gen.7.16|Gen 7:16]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דַּלְתֵי בִטְנִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Job.3.10|Job 3:10]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַחְמָהּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[1Sam.1.5|1Sam 1:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעַד‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַחְמָהּ‎</span> v[[1Sam.1.6|1Sam 1:6]] absolute ***shut*** (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּתַח‎</span>) [[Isa.22.22|Isa 22:22]] (twice in verse); metaphor <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶלְבָּמוֺ ס‎</span> [[Ps.17.10|Ps 17:10]] ***their fat*** (i.e. gross, unreceptive heart) ***they have closed***. 

**2. a.** ***close*** in upon (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעַד‎</span>) [[Judg.3.22|Judg 3:22]] (fat upon blade of sword), so possibly also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּסְגֹּר בָּשָׂר תַּחְתֶּנָּה‎</span> [[Gen.2.21|Gen 2:21]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) ***and flesh closed in***, in place of it (usually and he closed flesh, i.e. closed the gap with flesh); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלֵיהֶם הַמִּדְבָּר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Exod.14.3|Exod 14:3]] ***the wilderness hath closed in upon them***; object omitted, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסְגֹּר עַלאִֿישׁ‎</span> [[Job.12.14|Job 12:14]] ***he closeth in upon a man***, figurative of imprisonment. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***close up*** breach (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּרֶץ‎</span>) [in wall] of city [[1Kgs.11.27|1Kgs 11:27]] possibly ***close*** up [path] (si vera 1.) [[Ps.35.3|Ps 35:3]] [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] [[BDB#Ol|Ol]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]]; [[BDB#JDMich|JDMich]] [[BDB#De W|DeW]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Hup|Hup-Now]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] take <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְגֹר‎</span> here as weapon, usually ***battle-axe*** [Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">σάγαρις</span>] of Massagetae [[BDB#Herod|Herod]]<sup>i. 215</sup> compare [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Ges. Abh. 203</sup>, also Egyptian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***sagart·***</u></abbr> (loan-word) [[BDB#Bondi|Bondi]]<sup>55</sup>; both improbable, text probably corrupt; [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>ZAW xi (1891), 258</sup> reads <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲגֹר‎</span> &gt; [[BDB#Hal|Hal]]<sup>Rev. Sém. iii (1894), 47</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּרָה‎</span> (compare [[Ps.59.5|Ps 59:5]]). 

**3.** ***Passive participle, closed up*** = ***closely joined*** with tight seal, [[Job.41.7|Job 41:7]] (of scales of crocodile). 

**4.** elsewhere only ***Passive participle*** in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָהָב סָגוּר‎</span> (gold ***shut up***, and so ***prized, rare, fine*** ?), only of temple adornment and utensils [[1Kgs.6.20|1Kgs 6:20]]; [[1Kgs.6.21|1Kgs 6:21]]; [[1Kgs.7.49|1Kgs 7:49]]; [[1Kgs.7.50|1Kgs 7:50]]; [[1Kgs.10.21|1Kgs 10:21]] = [[1Chr.9.20|1Chr 9:20]]; [[1Chr.4.20|1Chr 4:20]]; [[1Chr.4.22|1Chr 4:22]] perhaps read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָגוּר‎</span> (abbreviated for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ז‎</span>) [[Job.28.15|Job 28:15]] (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְגוֺר‎</span>, so [[BDB#Hoffm|Hoffm]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]): compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—urâƒu sakru***</u></abbr>, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 499</sup>.

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְגַּר‎</span> [[1Sam.23.7|1Sam 23:7]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסָּגֵר‎</span> [[Ezek.46.2|Ezek 46:2]] 3 feminine singular jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּסָּגֵר‎</span> [[Num.12.14|Num 12:14]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּסָּגֵר‎</span> v[[Num.12.15|Num 12:15]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסָּנֵר֑וּ‎</span> [[Isa.45.1|Isa 45:1]]; [[Isa.60.11|Isa 60:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּסָּֽגְרוּ‎</span> [[Neh.13.19|Neh 13:19]] ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִסָּגֵר‎</span> [[Ezek.3.24|Ezek 3:24]] — 

**1.** subject person ***be shut up*** [in city] [[1Sam.23.7|1Sam 23:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִחוּץ לַמַּחֲנֶה‎</span> [[Num.12.14|Num 12:14]]; [[Num.12.15|Num 12:15]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּתוֺךְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּיִת‎</span> [[Ezek.3.24|Ezek 3:24]]. 

**2.** ***be shut, closed***, of city gates [[Ezek.46.2|Ezek 46:2]]; [[Isa.45.1|Isa 45:1]]; [[Isa.60.11|Isa 60:11]] and (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דלתות‎</span>) [[Neh.13.19|Neh 13:19]].

**Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִגַּר‎</span> [[1Sam.26.8|1Sam 26:8]]; [[2Sam.18.28|2Sam 18:28]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִגְּרַנִי‎</span> [[1Sam.24.19|1Sam 24:19]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְסַגֶּרְךָ‎</span> [[1Sam.17.46|1Sam 17:46]] — ***deliver up*** to (leave no other opening for one, shut one up to), compare [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָגַן‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִגֵּן‎</span>, p. 171 b above), only Samuel: with accusative of person + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּיַד‎</span> [[1Sam.17.46|1Sam 17:46]]; [[1Sam.24.19|1Sam 24:19]]; [[1Sam.26.8|1Sam 26:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּיַד‎</span> omitted [[2Sam.18.28|2Sam 18:28]] (see also **Hiph\`il**). p. 698 **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֻגַּר‎</span> [[Isa.24.10|Isa 24:10]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֻגְּרוּ‎</span> [[Jer.13.19|Jer 13:19]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְסֻגְּרוּ‎</span> consecutive [[Isa.24.22|Isa 24:22]] ***Participle*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְסֻגֶּ֫רֶת‎</span> [[Josh.6.1|Josh 6:1]] — ***be shut up:*** 

**1.** of cities [[Jer.13.19|Jer 13:19]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּתַח‎</span>), of beleaguered city [[Josh.6.1|Josh 6:1]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), of houses [[Isa.24.10|Isa 24:10]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִבּוֺא‎</span>). 

**2.** of prisoners <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלמַֿסְגֵּר‎</span> [[Isa.24.22|Isa 24:22]] = ***down into*** a dungeon. 

**3.** of doors [[Eccl.12.14|Eccl 12:14]].

**Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִסְגִּיר‎</span> [[Lev.14.46|Lev 14:46]] +; 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִסְגַּרְתַּ֫נִי‎</span> [[Ps.31.9|Ps 31:9]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִסְגַּרְתִּ֫י‎</span> [[Amos.6.8|Amos 6:8]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַסְגִּיר‎</span> [[Job.11.10|Job 11:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּסְגֵּר‎</span> [[Ps.78.48|Ps 78:48]]; [[Ps.78.62|Ps 78:62]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּסְגִּר‎</span> [[Deut.23.16|Deut 23:16]], jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּסְגֵּר‎</span> [[Obad.1.14|Obad 1:14]], etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסְגִּיר‎</span> [[Amos.1.6|Amos 1:6]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסְגִּירוֺ‎</span> [[1Sam.23.20|1Sam 23:20]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסְגִּירָם‎</span> [[Amos.1.9|Amos 1:9]] — 

**1.** ***deliver up*** to (compare **Pi\`el**), with accusative of person + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּיַד‎</span> [[1Sam.23.11|1Sam 23:11]]; [[1Sam.23.12|1Sam 23:12]]; [[1Sam.23.20|1Sam 23:20]]; [[1Sam.30.15|1Sam 30:15]]; [[Josh.20.5|Josh 20:5]] ([[BDB#D|D]]) [[Ps.31.9|Ps 31:9]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[Amos.1.9|Amos 1:9]]; [[Ps.78.50|Ps 78:50]]; [[Ps.78.62|Ps 78:62]], and (accusative of person omitted) [[Amos.1.6|Amos 1:6]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> [[Deut.23.16|Deut 23:16]]; [[Job.16.11|Job 16:11]] with accusative of animal + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[Ps.78.48|Ps 78:48]] with accusative of person alone [[Deut.32.30|Deut 32:30]]; [[Obad.1.14|Obad 1:14]], accusative omitted [[1Sam.23.12|1Sam 23:12]] with accusative urb. alone [[Amos.6.8|Amos 6:8]]. 

**2.** ***shut up*** (late; chiefly Lev 13, 14, [[BDB#P|P]]): 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** with accusative of person [[Lev.13.5|Lev 13:5]]; [[Lev.13.11|Lev 13:11]]; [[Lev.13.21|Lev 13:21]]; [[Lev.13.26|Lev 13:26]] compare v[[Lev.13.4|Lev 13:4]] v[[Lev.13.31|Lev 13:31]] v[[Lev.13.33|Lev 13:33]], so (absolute) = ***imprison*** [[Job.11.10|Job 11:10]] with accusative of thing [[Lev.13.54|Lev 13:54]] compare v[[Lev.13.50|Lev 13:50]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַבַּיִת‎</span> [[Lev.14.38|Lev 14:38]] and (indefinite subject) v[[Lev.14.46|Lev 14:46]].
